channel.title: Make this code non-multi

item.title: Make this code non-multi
item.dc:creator: @Runeblade912 Runeblade912
item.description:
@Runeblade912 wrote:

Uhh ok i think i fixed it!

public void IceBarrage(){ hitDiff = 1 + misc.random(25); // You might not need this inCombat(); attackPlayersWithin(5, 5, 5); actionTimer = 5; setAnimation(1979); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; }

public void IceBarrage(){ hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25); // You might not need this inCombat(); attackPlayersWithin(5, 5, 5); actionTimer = 5; setAnimation(1979); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; }

Its an autocast barrage code for my server but i cant make it non-multi with it working ive tried

public void IceBarrage(){ hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25); // You might not need this inCombat(); actionTimer = 5; setAnimation(1979); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; }
and

public void IceBarrage(){ inCombat(); actionTimer = 5; setAnimation(1979); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; }

Read full topic
